Sentencas: This study analyzes different hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system layouts.
Titulo: Efficiency analysis of a hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: It begins with a simple system layout without any anode off-gas recirculation, continues with a configuration equipped with off-gas recirculation, including steam condensation and then considers a layout with a dead-end anode off-gas loop.
Titulo: Efficiency analysis of a hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: Operational parameters such as stack fuel utilization, as well as the recirculation rate, are modified, with the aim of achieving the highest efficiency values.
Titulo: Efficiency analysis of a hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: Drawing on experiments and the accumulated experience of the SOFC group at the Forschungszentrum Julich, a set of operational parameters were defined and applied to the simulations.
Titulo: Efficiency analysis of a hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: It was found that anode off-gas recirculation, including steam condensation, improves electrical efficiency by up to 11.9 percentage-points compared to a layout without recirculation of the same stack fuel utilization.
Titulo: Efficiency analysis of a hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: A system layout with a dead-end anode off-gas loop was also found to be capable of reaching electrical efficiencies of more than 61%.
Titulo: Efficiency analysis of a hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation
Efficiency analysis of a hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation
Efficiency analysis of a hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recirculation
